definition: lump (of earth)/chunk/piece/classifier for pieces of cloth, cake, soap etc/(coll.) classifier for money and currency units
earth/dust/clay/local/indigenous/crude opium/unsophisticated/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
ghost/demon/terrible/damnable/clever/sly/crafty/(suffix for sb with a certain vice or addiction etc)/one of the 28 constellations
slab/(geology) tectonic plate/(fig.) sector (of the stock market or of industry)/(economic) bloc
erhua variant of 一塊|一块[yi1 kuai4]

sentences.english: Rib meat sheep will be washed, cut into 4 cm square block.
sentences.chinese: 將羊肋條肉洗淨，切成4釐米見方的塊。

sentences.english: The block decoupling problem for linear time-invariant systems is discussed.
sentences.chinese: 本文討論線性時不變系統的塊解耦問題。

sentences.english: Despite the clouds, the Matterhorn still was a great piece of rock to look at.
sentences.chinese: 除了雲朵外，馬特宏峯看上去始終是塊壯觀的石頭。

sentences.english: The dog soon ate up the nice cke.
sentences.chinese: 大狗很快就喫完了那塊美味的蛋糕。

sentences.english: What vitamin or what is that split to lack on the side of fingernail?
sentences.chinese: 手指甲旁邊那塊裂開了是缺少什麼維生素還是什麼啊？

sentences.english: The money was counted. The sum amounted to a little over twelve thousand dollars.
sentences.chinese: 29錢被過了數，總共有一萬二千塊美元。

sentences.english: Accentric block vibrating mechanism is applied to break the earth for pile sinking pipe to set down.
sentences.chinese: 採用偏心塊振動式機構，強迫振動土壤破裂下沉樁管。

sentences.english: At last the goatherd threw a stone, and breaking its horn.
sentences.chinese: 最後這個牧羊人扔了塊石頭打破了羊的角。

sentences.english: It also arranges for the old value to be restored when control leaves the current block.
sentences.chinese: 當控制離開當前塊時，它也會恢復$x的舊值。

sentences.english: This article introduces the methods of checking integrate circuit module and single crystal transistor.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了用萬用表檢測集成電路塊和單結晶體管的方法。

sentences.english: Bendong block is the biggest one that is not developed in Yanqi Basin.
sentences.chinese: 本東區塊是焉耆油區最大的未動用含油氣區塊。

sentences.english: Bendong block is the biggest one that is not developed in Yanqi Basin.
sentences.chinese: 本東區塊是焉耆油區最大的未動用含油氣區塊。

sentences.english: This grating was nothing else than a piece of the brass screens with which aviaries are covered in menageries .
sentences.chinese: 這個紗罩只不過是塊動物園裏供蒙鳥籠用的銅紗。

sentences.english: When he saw when the petals fell like a piece of them out of meat.
sentences.chinese: 當他看到花瓣掉了的時候，像是自己身上掉了塊肉。

sentences.english: Tests are very small, self-contained chunks of code.
sentences.chinese: 測試很小並且具有獨立的代碼塊。

definition: one block/one piece/one (unit of money)/together/in the same place/in company
coin/money/CL:筆|笔[bi3]/unit of weight, one tenth of a tael 兩|两[liang3]
individual/this/that/size/classifier for people or objects in general
to estimate/to reckon/CL:個|个[ge4]/(coll.) to suppose

point/dot/drop/speck/o'clock/point (in space or time)/to draw a dot/to check on a list/to choose/to order (food in a restaurant)/to touch briefly/to hint/to light/to ignite/to pour a liquid drop by drop/(old) one fifth of a two-hour watch 更[geng1]/dot stroke in Chinese characters/classifier for items
classifier for small spheres, pearls, corn grains, teeth, hearts, satellites etc
only/merely/no more than/but/however/anyway (to get back to a previous topic)/cannot be more (after adjectival)
